title: A Town Called Hell (1971 Western) starring Telly Savalas | You're lucky to get out alive.

sources.title: A Town Called Hell (1971 Western) starring Telly Savalas | You're lucky to get out alive.
sources.description:
A group of Mexican revolutionaries murders a town priest and a number of his christian followers. Ten years later, a widow arrives in a lawless Mexican town offering $20,000 for the name of her husband's killer, setting off a violent chain of betrayals in a corrupt town. A priest with a hidden past and a bandit leader clash as the truth about revolution and revenge comes to light.

Original title: A Town Called Bastard (1971)

Directors: Robert Parrish, Irving Lerner
Writers: Richard Aubrey, Benjamin Fisz
Stars: Telly Savalas, Robert Shaw, Stella Stevens
Genres: Action, Drama, Western, Spaghetti Western
Release date:  June 27, 1971


This film is available with dubbed Spanish audio, and subtitles in many languages.  Go to settings ⚙️ to change your language options from the drop down menu.
